#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 day five : Sweden , Belgium , England win three points
#Text=Tuesday , June 19 , 2018

#Text=Yesterday , day five of the 2018 FIFA football World Cup , Sweden defeated South Korea 1 – 0 ; Belgium defeated debutants Panama 3 – 0 ; and Tunisia lost 1 – 2 to England , with a late goal from English captain Harry Kane .
#Text=Group F — Sweden 1 – 0 Korea Republic
#Text=In the first game of the day , Sweden faced South Korea at the Nizhny Novgorod Stadium .
#Text=Sweden had higher ball possession in the game .
#Text=Korea 's Kim Shin-Wook was shown a yellow card early in the game .
#Text=In the 20th minute , Marcus Berg missed a chance to put Sweden in the lead .
#Text=Korea substituted Park Joo-Ho in the 28th minute of the game due to injury and was replaced by Kim Min-Woo .
#Text=Despite their attempts , neither side could open the scoring in the first half as it ended 0 – 0 .
#Text=In the second half , Hwang Hee-Chan was booked for a bad foul .
#Text=In the 62nd minute Kim Min-Woo conceded a penalty which the match referee Joel Aguilar awarded Sweden after confirming with the video assistant referee .
#Text=Swedish captain Andreas Granqvist scored from the penalty spot , putting Sweden 1 – 0 up .
#Text=In the injury time , Hwang Hee-Chan 's header went wide to the left , missing a chance to equalise for Korea .
#Text=The match ended with Sweden winning three points .
#Text=Swedish captain Andreas Granqvist won the Budweiser Man of the Match award .
#Text=This was Sweden 's first victory in the opening match of the World Cup since 1958 .
#Text=Group G — Belgium 3 – 0 Panama
#Text=In the first game of Group G , Belgium faced Panama at the Fisht Stadium in Sochi .
#Text=Belgium had greater ball possession in the match .
#Text=Belgium started the game with attacking style with Romelu Lukaku , Yannick Carrasco , and Dries Mertens making early attempts to put Belgium into the lead against debutans Panama .
#Text=Dries Mertens 's attempt in the 18th minute failed .
#Text=The first half ended with 0 – 0 on the scoreboard .
#Text=Just two minutes in the second half , Dries Mertens scored a goal from a volley , putting the Belgians in the lead .
#Text=Panama 's attempt in the 54th minute , by Michael Murillo , was saved by Thibaut Courtois .
#Text=In the 69th minute , Romelu Lukaku doubled the lead for Belgium , scoring a header from Kevin De Bruyne 's assist .
#Text=Six minutes later , Lukaku scored a third goal for Belgium , this time from Eden Hazard 's assist .
#Text=In the 90th minute , Belgium made a change , as Nacer Chadli replaced Axel Witsel .
#Text=The second half ended with the Belgians winning three points .
#Text=Five Panamanian players were booked in the match .
#Text=Lukaku won the Budweiser Man of the Match award .

#Text=After the match , Hernan Dario Gomez , Panama coach , said , " A woman has claimed that the Church of Scientology 's Cruise Ship , Freewinds , was imprisoned in the spartan life of an eight - year - old .
